ingredients: 1 cup cubed seeded watermelon, 1 cup seedless grapes , 1 cup cubed cantaloupe, 1 cup hulled and quartered strawberries, 1 cup peeled and quartered kiwi, 1 cup fresh blueberries, 3 sprigs fresh mint, 2 teaspoons white sugar, 3 tablespoons fresh lime juice
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 7mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 9%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 63mg 313%, Calcium 27mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 310mg 7%
